Reviews.Title: You Found Your Replacement
Reviews.Author: Raze
Reviews.Content: I accidentally washed my car remote by leaving it in my pants pockets.  Thus, despite the clean smell, I needed to buy a new one.The remotes and its expected associated functions work great!  As one would expect, the functionality matched in every way my previous remote.  I definitely recommend buying this remote.Plus, the price was substantially higher at the shop.On a final note, the instructions for programming the remotes are sparse and vague.  I brought it to my favorite audio car place (they do remote start as well) and had them program it for me.  Fortunately, I was able to get this service for free.  If you are spending more than 10-15 minutes attempting to program, then cave in and get help.  Otherwise you will end up like me, wasting a plethora of time for something that truly takes 3 minutes if you know how.

Reviews.Title: remotes
Reviews.Author: Joanne Womack
Reviews.Content: they look to be the same as i've got the originial just blk be i'm having a hard time getting someone to program them

Reviews.Title: Saved $$!
Reviews.Author: Andrew C. Slater
Reviews.Content: Went to a audio business and they wanted $125 for two remotes and to program them. I ordered these and had audio business program them for $30.They both worked perfectly and saved me a lot of bucks!

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Mike G
Reviews.Content: I lost my original remotes about 2 years ago and looked everywhere for it and was told I needed  a new system I saw this one here and thought it was a joke at the price they were asking, but I received it, programmed it and it works great. I recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: A Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Jamie R. Nelson "JamieReads"
Reviews.Content: For Christmas 2 years ago, we gave remote starters as presents.  We also bought extra remotes (since we have 4 drivers sharing 3 vehicles) like this one because they were much more affordable than a dealership remote.  This saved us hundreds of dollars!

Reviews.Title: Worked like a charm. Instructions included
Reviews.Author: R. Gurtovnik "rudeboyrg"
Reviews.Content: Worked without any problems. I've never setup an alarm remote. Have no experience at all. I ordered this so my wife can have a remote to access our car as well. I already have an avital and needed a second one. This came with instructions included in original box. You can also get them online. They pretty easy to follow. When they tell you to press the button on the remote to complete pairing, you just have to press ANY button on your remote. It doesn't matter which one. I set it up within 5 minutes. Super easy and worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Works like a champ
Reviews.Author: Scott St Onge
Reviews.Content: This little thing works like a champ. I lost my original smaller remote and was glad I found this one. Perfectly compatible with my Avital system.

Reviews.Title: Good, but support only fair
Reviews.Author: Stancomm
Reviews.Content: Fair price from the vendor, timely shipping! That was the good part.The manufacturer's pairing instructions, however, left a bit to be desired... like which button on the remote was to be pressed in order to complete the pairing sequence.Add to that insult, the manufacturer did not provide an easily found U.S. email address or phone number for technical help.Finally had to email their Canadian subsidiary who was more than helpful.Guess that once in while you do have to go "off shore" to get something done right.

Reviews.Title: weak
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: the item never came with instructions - when i emailed the company for instructions, they never wrote back.  I still have no idea how to sync this with my already installed system
